thread.title: Grammys 2017: Beyonce wows audience with gilded ode to race and motherhood
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: Beyonce wows audience with gilded ode to race and motherhood

author: Broede Carmody
title: Grammys 2017: Beyonce wows audience with gilded ode to race and motherhood
text:
Beyonce shows off her baby bump in an Instagram post announcing her pregnancy. Photo: Instagram 
She then performed Love Drought and Sandcastles , two songs from her latest album Lemonade while her family watched on from the audience. 
Shortly after her performance was over, Beyonce was called back on stage to accept the Grammy for best urban contemporary album. Advertisement 
During her acceptance speech, the superstar said she wanted her music to teach her children that it's OK to "confront issues that make us feel uncomfortable". 
"This is something I want for every child of every race," she said. SHARE
